Class StringOfBits

  • java.lang.Object
    • StringOfBits

  • public class StringOfBits
extends Object
    Represents a string of bit values (0 or 1).
    Version:
    14 October 2016
    Author:
    Bennett Alex Myers

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ArrayList<Integer> bits
      Internal bit array.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StringOfBits()
      Constructs the empty bit string; length == 0.
      StringOfBits(CharSequence chars)
      Constructs a bit string from a sequence of '0' and '1' characters.
      StringOfBits(StringOfBits sb)
      Copy constructor.

      StringOfBits append(boolean b)

        Internal bit array.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StringOfBits

        public StringOfBits()
        Constructs the empty bit string; length == 0.

      • StringOfBits

        public StringOfBits(StringOfBits sb)
        Copy constructor.
        Parameters:
        sb - the object to be cloned

      • StringOfBits

        public StringOfBits(CharSequence chars)
        Constructs a bit string from a sequence of '0' and '1' characters. If the parameter is not comprised of '0' and '1' characters the behavior is undefined.
        Parameters:
        chars - the sequence to convert into bits

    • Method Detail

      • length

        public int length()
        Returns the length of this bit string.
        Returns:
        the number of bits in this string

      • append

        public StringOfBits append(char c)
        Appends the bit string representation of the parameter to this bit string. If the parameter is not '0' or '1' the behavior of this method is undefined.
        Parameters:
        c - the bit to append
        Returns:
        a reference to this bit string

      • append

        public StringOfBits append(boolean b)
        Appends the bit string representation of the parameter to this bit string; false corresponds to 0, true corresponds to 1.
        Parameters:
        b - the bit to append
        Returns:
        a reference to this bit string

      • append

        public StringOfBits append(int i)
        Appends the bit string representation of the parameter to this bit string. Each digit represents a single bit. If any digit of the parameter is not 0 or 1 the behavior is undefined.
        Parameters:
        i - an integer representation of a bit sequence
        Returns:
        a reference to this bit string

      • append

        public StringOfBits append(CharSequence str)
        Appends the bit string representation of the parameter to this bit string. Each substring of "0" corresponds to 0; each "1" corresponds to 1. If the string contains other than "0" and "1" the behavior of this method is undefined.
        Parameters:
        str - a string
        Returns:
        a reference to this bit string

      • append

        public StringOfBits append(StringOfBits bitstr)
        Appends the parameter to this bit string.
        Parameters:
        bitstr - a bit string to be appended
        Returns:
        a reference to this bit string

      • charAt

        public char charAt(int index)
            throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Returns a char corresponding to the bit at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the desired bit value
        Returns:
        the char value at the specified index
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index is negative or greater than or equal to length()

      • intAt

        public int intAt(int index)
          throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Returns an int corresponding to the bit at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the desired bit value
        Returns:
        the int value corresponding to the specified index (0 == 0; 1 == 1)
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index is negative or greater than or equal to length()

      • booleanAt

        public boolean booleanAt(int index)
                  throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Returns a boolean corresponding to the bit at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the desired value
        Returns:
        the boolean at the specified index (0 == false; 1 == true)
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index is negative or greater than or equal to length()

      • setBitAt

        public void setBitAt(int index,
                     char c)
        Sets the bit at the specified index. If the parameter is not '0' or '1' the behavior of this method is undefined.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the bit to modify
        c - the new value ('0' == 0; '1' == 1)

      • setBitAt

        public void setBitAt(int index,
                     int i)
        Sets the bit at the specified index. If the parameter is not 0 or 1 the behavior of this method is undefined.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the bit to modify
        i - the new value (0 == 0; 1 == 1)

      • setBitAt

        public void setBitAt(int index,
                     boolean b)
        Sets the bit at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the bit to modify
        b - the new value (false == 0; true == 1)

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • toBitArray

        private static ArrayList<Integer> toBitArray(String bitString)
        Utility method for converting string representations of bit string to an array of ints.
        Parameters:
        bitString - the string to be converted
        Returns:
        an arraylist of bits; if the original string contained characters other than 0 or 1, they are converted to 0.

      • charToInt

        private static int charToInt(char c)
        Utility method to convert char representation of bit string to int.
        Parameters:
        c - the char to be converted
        Returns:
        1 if the char is '1', 0 otherwise

      • booleanToInt

        private static int booleanToInt(boolean b)
        Utility method to convert boolean representation of bit string to int.
        Parameters:
        b - the boolean to be converted
        Returns:
        1 if the boolean is true, 0 otherwise

      • constrainInt

        private static int constrainInt(int i)
        Utility method to constrain range of ints.
        Parameters:
        i - the int to be constrained
        Returns:
        1 if the int is equal to 1, 0 otherwise
